alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:45PM EDT until April 03 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cass River At Frankenmuth. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to late Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 17.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Impact...The river begins to overflow its banks in places. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
